name: KittyVerse
description:
Welcome to the Kitty Verse! 

Your kitty is lost. Can you complete the puzzles that bring your kitty back to you?
This game made for the Adventure Jam 2022.

How to Play MovementA , D , S Left Mouse clickJumpW,  Up ArrowPick up / Use itemLeft Mouse click on itemUse item held itemLeft Mouse click on item to use it with.Release ItemXRight Mouse click

Note: You can pick up only one item at a time.

Have fun and let us know what you think! 

Creative Team

Randy Larson - Programming
Georgeth Lyver - UX/UI artist
Trevor Redfern - sound/music
Cindy Rivera - UX/UI artist
Jennevieve Schlemmer - artist
